name: Chaos T
description:
You know this game. But this time, you have no control over the shapes! Fortunately you have control over the playfield. Clear lines to set a new highscore. The fall speed increases after every 5th cleared line.

Chaos T was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the theme

OUT OF CONTROL

by me with Game Maker 2 as base engine and bfxr.net for soud effects.

Use WASD to move the playfield.

The inteded version for the game jam is the base version. The classic version is the good old classic, as you may know it. Full Chaos version is the jam version with no balancing - the shapes move like they want.
